projects.name: Eight Roads
projects.description: Introducing the new brand for Moonray Investors and Fidelity Growth Partners

professional.title: SpectraKey
text: SpectraKey is a small creative media team crafting products for the web and video platforms.
skills: Consulting with clients to help them understand their web requirements
Building responsive websites using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and jQuery. Integrated with Joomla CMS (PHP/MySQL)
Undertaken training in Node.js, Angular.js, and UX techniques
Linux server administration; managed hosting service
Setup and management of cloud storage service

professional.title: BSc (Hons) Music Technology - 1st
text: I undertook a major technology project to design and build an interactive performace controller for electric guitarists.

The aim was to enable guitarists to interact with their instrument’s sound in unique and intuitive ways. I wanted to challenge the inflexibities in traditional guitar systems, which offer limited real-time control of effects processing.

interests.title: Explorer
text: I love the outdoors. There’s nothing better than slipping on the walking boots and venturing into the english countryside; discovering hidden landscapes and gathering inspiration with my camera. When I’m feeling a little more adventurous I can be found climbing up cliff-faces.

interests.title: Music
text: I’ve played guitar from an early age. I enjoy getting invloved in live music events. Currently I help run Discovery2’s emerging talent showcase.
